title: Millennials Coping With Capitalism
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: A 2016 Harvard University study showed that a majority of millennial reject capitalism. Drill down today’s CDC report about decreasing U.S. longevity, primarily because of opioid deaths, and you see that millennials have the highest proportion of such deaths, and the highest increase in suicides. Is there a connection? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

A 2016 Harvard University study showed that a majority of millennial reject capitalism.
